trans-unit.target: A complete enterprise-ready Symfony 7.3 application featuring PostgreSQL 18, Redis 7, FrankenPHP 1.9, and modern development practices.

trans-unit.note: Button text to view organization details
Link to go back to organizations list
Section title for users list in organization

trans-unit.target: Describe the organization's purpose and activities
Add a new organization to your system
Organization names should be descriptive and unique within your system.
Are you sure you want to delete "%name%"?
The organization has been updated with your changes.
Cannot delete organization with assigned users
Invalid security token. Please try again.
Organization name must be at least 2 characters long

trans-unit.note: Error when CSRF token is invalid

trans-unit.target: You must be logged in to switch organizations.

Error when organization does not exist

trans-unit.target: Your organization has been changed to: %name%
trans-unit.note: Success message when organization is switched

trans-unit.target: Organization context cleared. You are now accessing as admin.
trans-unit.note: Success message when organization context is cleared
Button text to view user details
Link to go back to users list
Link to go back to dashboard
Message when no description is provided

trans-unit.target: Start building your network by adding your first contact. Our AI will help you manage relationships and provide valuable insights.
Start building your business relationships by creating your first organization. Our AI will help you manage and grow these connections.
Start building relationships by adding contacts to this organization.
trans-unit.note: Empty state description for organization contacts

trans-unit.target: Start building your course by adding the first lecture.
trans-unit.note: Empty state description for course lectures
Hint for mobile users to scroll table horizontally

trans-unit.target: AI-powered contact management and relationship insights
Manage your business relationships with AI insights
Create and manage courses with lectures and student enrollments
Voice commands, WhatsApp integration, and natural language processing
AI-driven insights and customer behavior predictions
Intelligent workflows and automated customer interactions
Configure AI assistant behavior and preferences
Ask me anything about your CRM
All systems secure and up to date
Modern dark interface with neon accents
Clean light interface with vibrant colors
Sign in to continue to your account
Join Infinity and start managing your data
Registration successful! You can now log in.
Keep this token secure. It provides full access to your account via the API.
Are you sure you want to revoke this token? Applications using it will lose access.
You don't have an active API token
Use your API token in the Authorization header of your requests:
Never share your API token publicly
Use environment variables to store tokens in applications
Regenerate tokens periodically for better security
Revoke old token before generating new one
Are you sure you want to delete %name%?
Add a new user to the system
Start building your team by adding the first user
Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Are you sure you want to delete
You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?
An error occurred while saving. Please try again.
Failed to open form. Please try again.

trans-unit.note: Search input placeholder for courses list

trans-unit.target: Course name must be at least 2 characters
Total length must be zero or positive
Fill in the course details below. You can add lectures after creating the course.
Lecture name must be at least 2 characters
Please upload a valid video file (MP4, WebM, OGG, MOV)
Order must be zero or positive
Add a new lecture to the course
Fill in the lecture details below. The order determines the sequence in the course.
Are you sure you want to remove %student% from this course?
Only users from the same organization who are not yet enrolled will be shown
This student is already enrolled in this course
Start building your class by enrolling students from your organization
Select multiple students to enroll at once
Unselecting a student will automatically deactivate their enrollment (not delete)
Type to search by name or email
Removing a student from selection will deactivate (not delete) their enrollment. They will lose access to the course but their progress will be preserved.
Toggle switches to enroll/deactivate students. Click Confirm to save changes.
